affinity.description: Affinity and anti-affinity rules for runner pod scheduling. [Affinity](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/assign-pod-node/#affinity-and-anti-affinity).

targetCPUUtilizationPercentage.description: Target CPU utilization percentage for scaling.

targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage.description: Target memory utilization percentage for scaling.

env.description: Define environment variables for the runner container.

envFrom.description: Define environment variables from existing ConfigMap or Secret data.

extraContainers.description: Additional sidecar containers to run alongside the runner container.

extraVolumeMounts.description: Additional volume mounts for the runner container.

extraVolumes.description: Additional volumes to attach to the runner pods.

fullnameOverride.description: Override the fully qualified app name.

nameOverride.description: Override the name of the app.

name.description: Specify the image name to use (relative to `image.repository`).

pullPolicy.description: Specify the image pull policy. Valid values are `Always`, `Never`, `IfNotPresent`. [imagePullPolicy](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/containers/images/#image-pull-policy).

pullSecrets.description: Specify the image pull secrets if pulling from private registry [imagePullSecrets](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/containers/images/#specifying-imagepullsecrets-on-a-pod).

repository.description: Specify the image repository to use.

tag.description: Overrides the image tag whose default is the chart appVersion.

initContainers.description: Init containers to run before the main runner container.

lifecycle.description: Lifecycle hooks for the runner container. [Lifecycle](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/containers/container-lifecycle-hooks/).

livenessProbe.description: Liveness probe configuration for the runner container. [LivenessProbe](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/configure-liveness-readiness-startup-probes/#configure-probes).

nodeSelector.description: Node selector for scheduling runner pods on specific nodes. [nodeSelector](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/assign-pod-node/#nodeselector).

enabled.description: Enable persistent storage for runner data.

existingClaim.description: Name of an existing PersistentVolumeClaim to use instead of creating a new one.

mountPath.description: Path inside the container where the volume will be mounted.

storageClassName.description: Storage class name for the PersistentVolumeClaim.

podAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to the runner pods.

podLabels.description: Labels to add to the runner pods.

podPriorityClassName.description: Priority class name for the runner pods. [priorityClassName](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/pod-priority-preemption/#priorityclass).

podSecurityContext.description: Pod security context configuration. Only applied when using rootless container. [PodSecurityContext](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/security-context/).

readinessProbe.description: Readiness probe configuration for the runner container. [ReadinessProbe](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/configure-liveness-readiness-startup-probes/#configure-probes).

replicas.description: Number of runner replicas. Only one replica is supported as runner doesn't support clustering.

resources.description: Resource requests and limits for the runner container. [Resources](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-resources-containers/).

data.description: Specify runner's custom configuration in YAML format.

enabled.description: Enable custom configuration for the runner deployment.
Enable Docker in Docker with root user.

image.description: Docker DinD image repository and tag.

instanceURL.description: Gitea instance URL where the runner will register.

key.description: Specify the key in the secret that contains the Runner registration token.

name.description: Specify the secret name containing the Runner registration token.

value.description: Set the Runner registration token value. If existing secret is specified this value is not used.

type.description: Specify the deployment used to replace old Pods by new ones valid options are `RollingUpdate`, `Recreate`. [strategy](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/controllers/deployment/#strategy)

securityContext.description: Security context configuration for the runner container. [SecurityContext](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/security-context/).

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the service account.

create.description: Specifies whether a service account should be created.

name.description: The name of the service account to use. If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the fullname template.

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: Termination grace period in seconds for the runner pods.

tolerations.description: Tolerations for scheduling runner pods on nodes with taints. [Tolerations](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/taint-and-toleration/).

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology spread constraints for distributing runner pods across zones/nodes. [TopologySpreadConstraints](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/topology-spread-constraints/).
